hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: You thought it would be a useful hint, but it was me, Junk Hint!

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #3# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Piece of the Triforce#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block Fourth Chest

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that if you don't use your slingshot at all when you play the slingshot minigame, the owner gets upset with you.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Fire Temple#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #ReDead in the royal tomb# guard #a Red Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that racing #Damp's ghost# rewards...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #a Heart Container# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Deku Tree#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Ice Cavern#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Hallway Right Invisible Chest

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #5# major items.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #flames in the royal tomb# reveal #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: Expired Spoiler Log? Don't worry! The OoTR Discord staff can help you out.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the path of #gold#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Hover Boots# can be found in #the Market#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Fire Arrows# and #the Lens of Truth#.
